text:
the derivative of f(x), we obtain
∇x(xlog2 x) = 1 ·log2 x+ x· 1
xloge2 = log2 x+ 1
loge2 . (7.32)
Using the same two test points x = 2 and x = 4 , the left-hand side of
(7.31) is given by f(4) = 8. The right-hand side is
f(x) + ∇⊤
x(y−x) = f(2) + ∇f(2) ·(4 −2) (7.33a)
= 2 + (1 + 1
loge2) ·2 ≈6.9 . (7.33b)
